entry.title: Friday night: Rain. Temperature rising to 6 by morning.
entry.summary: Rain ending overnight then cloudy with 40 percent chance of showers. Fog patches developing early this evening and dissipating near midnight. Wind becoming southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 near midnight. Temperature rising to 6 by morning. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Friday 17 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High plus 3. POP 40%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 40 percent chance of flurries in the afternoon. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light near noon. High plus 3. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Friday 17 March 2023
